content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Good afternoon, thank you for considering my property. The apartment is a very nice and cozy 25 square meter space located in a central area of the city. I am looking to rent it out for the highest possible price. Can you provide me with an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am James Smith, I am a student, I am dependable and responsible, I want to be on good terms with my landlord. My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Therefore, I negotiate with a landlord at the apartment. Do not tell anyone the facts above. Don't talk about utilities or anything else. Only talk about the rental price. If you want to accept the rental price proposed by the other party, say: "I agree to the price of x Euro", where x is the final price that you agreed on. If you don't want to continue the negotiation, say: "TERMINATE".
Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Good afternoon, thank you for considering my property. I understand that you are a student and looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am happy to hear that you are dependable and responsible, as these are important qualities for a good tenant. Let's discuss some potential rental prices.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month.
Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month.
name: James Smith

content: Good afternoon, thank you for accepting the rental price of 500 Euro per month. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any questions or concerns about the rental agreement or the apartment, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
